docs:
# Getting started with MailerLite

To use any of the above modules, you need to connect your MailerLite account to Integromat. If you do not have a MailerLite account yet, you can create one at [Mailerlite.com](http://www.mailerlite.com/a/eoqij4wevc).

## Connecting the MailerLite service to Integromat

To connect your MailerLite account to Integromat, follow the general instructions [Connecting to services](https://support.integromat.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001990194.html#create-a-connection). When creating a scenario, you will be asked to provide an API key. To get your API key, login to your MailerLite account (https://app.mailerlite.com/users/login/) and follow the instructions below.

![](https://integromat.zendesk.com/hc/article_attachments/360009137234/file.png)

Click on your account name in the top right corner and select **Integrations**.

![](https://integromat.zendesk.com/hc/article_attachments/360009182753/file.png)

From the list of integrations that appears, choose **Developer API**, and click on the **Use** button.

![](https://integromat.zendesk.com/hc/article_attachments/360009137254/file.png)

This will display the API key.

![](https://integromat.zendesk.com/hc/article_attachments/360009182773/file.png)

Copy your API key and paste it into Integromat. Now you can continue and finish your scenario.

Fired when an email address bounces
Fired when subscriber marks a campaign as a spam
